attributes.action: Pay MP's mimimum wage and see if they can live on it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want MP's to live off the mimimum wage for one year and see if they can manage on the amount.  Also want the expenses taken away from them and have them pay for everything like the rest of us.  I bet that the fuel duty goes down along with alot of other things.  Mp's should be treated exactly like everyone else and they will fight for the people on issues instead of for themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
